channel.title: Quickstart - Uplink CLI on Storj Docs

item.title: Prerequisites
item.description: Prerequisites # Create an Account # Click on Start for free Select a Satellite, and sign up for an account. After sign up, you will receive a verification email. Click the button prompting you to verify your email. To get started, the following steps will take you through the process of uploading your first object via the CLI Tool so that you can see how objects uploaded to the network are distributed across the nodes.
